Text:
This is the 1994 Atlantic co version. It does have 1 thing going for it: it is pre-loudness-war. 

It sounds rather muffled in comparison to the 2008 Re-master. The 2008 Re-master from the  1970-1975 (boxset SACD) is much clearer and sounds like a veil is lifted. You can hear the music much better and there is a much better soundstage. So get that one.
